I've played the demo of G:BF, and it didn't work that well on my 233 (way too 
slow), so I deleted from my system.  It wasn't that great either -- you can 
only pick a soldier to fight with.  It also takes about 10-20mb of file space 
if I recall correctly.  Anyway, I got it from a website.  Can't remember the 
url of the website, however.  Sorry dudes.

Tristan
